name: Jump via CACTUS (Godot Wild Jam 31)
description:
This is a very usual platformer, nothing strange to see here at all 😐

Controls
  • WASD/Arrows to move.
  • W/Up/Space to jump.
  • 1/2/3/4 to use items.  1 & 2 spawn something in the world, 3 & 4 are toggles. (If you use an Azerty keyboard, make sure to hold Shift while pressing the number)

Created by @Origami Dragon Studio & @SanderVhove for the Godot Wild Jam #31.
